product_name: The North Face Komit Performance Quarter-Zip Top - Boys' - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The North Face Komit Performance Quarter-Zip top offers boys a fleece pullover that feels like a favorite sweatshirt but holds its own against frequent playground and trail use. Stretch polyester fabric with VaporWick(TM) wicks moisture away from skin so he stays dry and comfortable when working hard. Built-in UPF 50+ sun protection continuously guards against harmful ultraviolet rays. Quarter-zip at the neck promotes venting. The Komit Performance Quarter-Zip top features flat-locked stitching that minimizes chafing. Closeout.
short_description: The North Face Komit Performance Quarter-Zip top offers boys a fleece pullover that feels like a favorite sweatshirt but holds its own against frequent playground and trail use.
